main event: A white object of intense brilliance was tracked on ground radar and observed visually over the state of Alabama, traveling at a speed of 1,200 mph and an altitude of 20,000 ft.
interesting points: The object was first detected on ground radar and then observed visually.
The object was described as a white object of intense brilliance.
The object was tracked at a speed of 1,200 mph and an altitude of 20,000 ft.
Several other reports from the ground and local CAA about the same object on the same evening were received.
A National Guard jet pilot had to avoid a collision with a bluish-white object that had a steady time shooting cut from its back.
sighted object: a white object of intense brilliance
